titleNullable: Dataset for Facial recognition using ML approach
subtitleNullable: Web scrapped image data of various celebrities
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Web scrapped Image data of various celebrities

### Content

The dataset contains images of 

- Data
 - Akshay Kumar
 - Deepika Padukone
 - Nora Fatehi
 - Ranbir Kapoor
 - Urvashi Rautela
 - Virat Kohli
 - Maria Sharapova
 - Lionel Messi

- OpenCv
 - All the haarcascades of openCV i.e. haarcascade_eyes.xml, haarcascade_fullbody.xml, haarcascade_frontalcatface.xml, haarcascade_frontalfacealt.xml etc.

- test
 - Some test images for prediction

And a cropped folder for training the model. The modeling code couldn't be created here so providing [git link for the modeling code](https://github.com/RashikRahman/Face_Match_Classifier/blob/master/model/Data%20Prep%20%26%20Modeling.ipynb).
The model was trained on the images of the cropped folder as it contains the processed version of the raw data. Prediction code can be found in the code section of this dataset.
